definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Well, Ikea certainly seems to think so.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，宜家似乎是這樣認爲的。

sentences.english: The boldly striped Ikea pillows pick up on the geometry of the windows.
sentences.chinese: 還有這些粗線宜家牌枕頭，讓窗子的幾何感更好了。

sentences.english: At IKEA, you can choose between pre-cut and custom-made worktops.
sentences.chinese: 宜家提供預切割和定製切割的操作檯面。

sentences.english: More recently, IKEA has had problems in Russia, where it has 12 stores.
sentences.chinese: 最近，宜家在它有着12家門店的俄羅斯遇到了問題。

sentences.english: Kamprad's official title with the company now is senior adviser.
sentences.chinese: 坎普拉德對外宣稱的頭銜是宜家高級顧問。

sentences.english: Kampradâ€™s official title with the company now is senior adviser.
sentences.chinese: 坎普拉德對外宣稱的頭銜是宜家高級顧問。

sentences.english: The light fixture is from Ikea.
sentences.chinese: 其它的小傢俱來自宜家。

sentences.english: For now, IKEA and the lonely hearts are in an uneasy truce.
sentences.chinese: 現在，宜家公司與孤身人們仍然處於緊張的休戰階段。

sentences.english: Its parent company is Inter IKEA Holding, registered in Luxembourg.
sentences.chinese: 它的母公司是國際宜家控股集團，註冊在盧森堡。

sentences.english: We’ve tried to keep the bedding simplified with white linens and a 4-poster bed from Ikea.
sentences.chinese: 我們追求簡潔，用了宜家四柱牀和白色的牀套。

sentences.english: I met Charlie Brown in Ikea.
sentences.chinese: 我在宜家傢俬遇見查理布朗。

sentences.english: It feels something like a brainstorming meeting or an IKEA furniture assembly session.
sentences.chinese: 就像是一次頭腦風暴會議或者宜家傢俱組裝會議。

sentences.english: Bai mapped out a five-hour outing.
sentences.chinese: 白雅琳籌劃了一個在宜家的五小時遊玩計劃。

sentences.english: 'Members of the dating group appear unbowed by the company's efforts to chase them off.
sentences.chinese: 面對宜家的驅逐，相親團成員並沒有屈服。

sentences.english: Good good study. Day day up…
sentences.chinese: 從宜家開始，本人要好好學習仂。

sentences.english: Another hyper-growth brand, IKEA, has the same belief.
sentences.chinese: 另一個快速成長的品牌宜家，也擁有同樣的理念。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
